citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:08 am on
21-Nov-17.
Inspector knocked and rang the door bell. Phone call was made to the licensee. Business card was left on the front
door.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:08 am on
21-Nov-17.
Inspector knocked and rang the door bell.  Phone call was made to the licensee.  Business card was left on the front
door.
